Title: Pets && Presets Mash-Up
Description:
Compilation mod pack for the {{Y|Caves of Qud Modding Jam: Pets && Presets}}, which ran at the beginning of November 2024. See all the entries at {{C|https://itch.io/jam/caves-of-qud-modding-jam-3/entries}}!

Use the in-game wish menu (Debug > Wish Menu) to add a pet in-game, or choose the {{W|Spawn Every Pet}} pet to start the game with every pet ({{Y|chaos will ensue}}).

{{W|Warning:}} Do not run this pack simultaneous with any of the mods contained within.
Author: Mod Jam Participants and Organizers
